DESCRIPTION: The #yActive Ghostflame can be Charged. At the end of your turn, the next Ghostflame becomes #yActive automatically.
#yActivate the next Ghostflame. If it's Charged, #yExtinguish it.
#yActivate the previous Ghostflame. If it's Charged, #yExtinguish it.
Increase the damage, #yBlock, or #yBurn of a Ghostflame by #b1.
Burned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Burn is halved (rounding down).
Remove the Charge from a Ghostflame, allowing it to be Charged again.
Can't be upgraded. If all #b6 Seals have been played this combat, obtain #pThe #pBroken #pSeal and remove the Seals from your deck.
